page.title: 14Trades and Businesses
page.content: The trade in Alderney is quite high even though it is a small island. Some of the businesses are:_ 6 clothes shops, 4 grocers, 1 shoe shop, 1 chemist, 2 handicraft shops, 2 dentists, 3 cafes, 1 sweet shop, 3 garages, 10 builders, 2 bookshops, 1 dairy, 2 cycle hires, 2 jewellers, 2 fancy goods shops, 4 electrical goods shops, 7 restaurants, 2 butchers, 4 doctors, 2 wool shops, 1 toyshop, 1 flower shop, 2 chip shops, 1 optician, local glass wear and engraving,1 stamp shop, 1 travel agent, 2 newsagents, 2 hairdressers, 1 hardwear shop, 1 baker, 1 health shop, 1 pottery and 1 post office.This is all the trade in Alderney except banks, hotels and house building.The variety shows how a fairly isolated community has to be self-sufficient.
